nodes.text: Saliah was a female Duros communications officer serving Captain Booster Terrik aboard the Errant Venture in 44 ABY. She helped relay the communications between the Errant Venture and the Jedi Order in order to coordinate the Jedi's StealthX launch with the Errant Venture's Tendrando Arms Celebrity Sabacc Charity Challenge that was set to distract the orbiting Sixth Fleet and allow the Jedi to launch.
